dict.string: This app needs location for direction.
This app needs location for direction.
This app needs location for direction.
This app needs location for direction.
This app uses the camera for AR-based positioning and nearby interaction.
Bluetooth is required to communicate with nearby devices using UWB.
Local network access is used to find and connect to nearby iPhones.
Motion data helps improve AR tracking and direction accuracy.
Nearby Interaction is used to measure precise distance and direction to another iPhone.
